questions.question: A group of interbreeding organisms whose offspring are themselves fertile is defined as a ____.
Biology is the scientific study of ____.
All living organisms sense their environment and respond to it.
Which statement supports the theory that all living organisms descended from one common ancestor?
possible_answers: Bacteria have a cell wall outside the plasma membrane.
Some organisms are consumers, whereas others are producers.
All living organisms use DNA as their hereditary material.
questions.correct_answer: All living organisms use DNA as their hereditary material.

questions.question: Which statement represents the biological characteristics that kittens, oak trees, swans, earthworms, elephants, and crickets have in common?
possible_answers: DNA nucleotides form the basis of inherited life, with cells that are formed from other cells.
RNA nucleotides form the basis of inherited life, with cells that are formed spontaneously from the environment.
RNA nucleotides form the basis of all inherited life, with cells that are formed from other cells.
DNA nucleotides form the basis of inherited life, with cells that are formed spontaneously from the environment.
questions.correct_answer: DNA nucleotides form the basis of inherited life, with cells that are formed from other cells.

questions.question: The main source of energy for producers in an ecosystem is ____.
A biologist studying how pollution affects algal growth and snail populations in a portion of Lake Erie is studying which level of organization?
A localized group of organisms that belong to the same species is called a ____.
New cells are created when existing cells divide; immediately after division, every cell of every known living organism will contain DNA.
A molecule is constructed when two or more atoms become bonded to each other.
Groups of different species that live and interact in a given area are referred to as a ____.
All the organisms on your campus make up a ____.
Which of the following lists the terms from simplest to most complex?
possible_answers: cells, tissues, organs, organ systems, organism
tissues, organs, organ systems, organism, cells
organs, organ systems, organism, cells, tissues
questions.correct_answer: cells, tissues, organs, organ systems, organism

questions.question: Which of the following terms best describes the North American rocky intertidal zone shown in the photograph?
Which of the following correctly represents the biological hierarchy of a multicellular organism?
possible_answers: cells → tissues → organs → organ systems → individual
organ systems → organs → tissues → cells → individual
tissues → organs → organ systems → cells → individual
questions.correct_answer: cells → tissues → organs → organ systems → individual
